description:
Form (e.g. Contact Us, Appointment Request etc.) plugin for Bubble.

Plugin instructions: https://github.com/dipbhi/Bubble-Plugin-Sociocs---Form/wiki/Bubble-Sociocs---Form-plugin-setup

Sociocs inbox is available as web app and mobile apps.

- Web App: https://app.sociocs.com
- Mobile Apps: https://mobileapps.page.link/sociocs

This plugin works for both PAID and FREE Sociocs accounts.

Other plugins: https://sociocs-plugins.bubbleapps.io/version-test/
name: Sociocs - Form
